[I have been in the hospital thats why I have not been posting I am ok.]

Angel Prime/Shocker/Icedragon/Tigerhawk/Blade Runner/Depth Charge/Fury



Angel Prime opened a com to Zardus.


Angel Prime:


"can't even fight your own battles coward."

he ended the transmission. Then he noticed that alot of shots were coming at 
him. he did the only thing he could. he formed another terror force it would 
be awhile be for he could use any energy attacks but it was the only thing 
he could do. he threw it up it exploded throwing him flying backwards.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Shocker he formed some water in his hands and threw it at Pryos fireballs he 
started laughing then he was hit by many shots. there way to many shots for 
his body to handle. he fell hand first to the ground. he knew that he would 
die one die just not now. he went off line his spark was no more then a 
memory.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Icedragon moved over then he transformed and fired two missles at Sixshot.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Tigerhawk


fired lighting at all shots that were coming at him.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Blade Runner



he fired some more claws at the shots coming at him but some shots caught 
him.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Depth Charge



he flew towards the sun so know one could see him. he fired off two ion 
disks at demon wulf.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Fury fired another shot in his tank mode at pryo.




[Please put shocker on the deased list died by multpile Alliance attacks]
